text: Hi there! How are you doing today?
im ok and you
I'm doing great! Do you have any interest in learning about and potentially donating to a charity?
yes i would
That's great! The charity I'm helping is called Save the Children.
oh how would you help the children
Well the charity collects money to help protect children's rights all across the globe.
oh ok thats nice
As you know, children can be extremely helpless, especially in third world countries, so they deserve all the help they can get.
i know i would like to help them with 5 dollars
$5 could make a huge different in a lot of kids lives. Are there any questions you have?
no its ok i just like children because they need help
Do you donate to any other charities?
i use to
What kind of charities do you enjoy donating to?
i like to give out toys and if i have some type of change i give it out
That's very kind of you. So can I rely on you to donate $5 from your task today to help this charity out?
yes i would like to
That's great. You should have the option coming up to help you make a donation.
yes i like to give out things
